author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 2 trailer for Severance, a mystery drama distributed by Apple TV Plus.

Mark Scout leads a team at Lumon Industries, whose employees have undergone a severance procedure, which surgically divides their memories between their work and personal lives. This daring experiment in “work-life balance” is called into question as Mark finds himself at the center of an unraveling mystery that will force him to confront the true nature of his work… and of himself.

In season two, Mark and his friends learn the dire consequences of trifling with the severance barrier, leading them further down a path of woe.

Severance stars Adam Scott, Britt Lower, Tramell Tillman, Zach Cherry, Jen Tullock, Michael Chernus, Dichen Lachman, John Turturro, Christopher Walken, Patricia Arquette, Sarah Bock, and more. The series is directed by Ben Stiller, Uta Bresiewitz, Sam Donovan, and Jessica Lee Gagné. Severance is written, created, and executive produced by Dan Erickson.

Severance Seaso
title: Severance - Official Season 2 Trailer (2024) Adam Scott, Britt Lower, Tramell Tillman | CCXP 2024

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest trailer for The Gorge, an action drama romance film distributed by Skydance Media and Apple TV Plus.

Two very dangerous young people who, despite the corrupt and lethal world they operate in, find a soulmate in each other.

The Gorge stars Anya Taylor-Joy, Sigourney Weaver, Miles Teller, William Houston, Samantha Coughlan, Julianna Kurokawa, Alessandro Garcia, and more. The film is directed by Scott Derrickson and written by Zach Dean.

The Gorge is premiering on February 14, 2025 on Apple TV Plus.

#TheGorge #IGN #AppleTVPlus
title: The Gorge - Official Trailer (2024) Anya Taylor-Joy, Sigourney Weaver, Miles Teller

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Ballistic Cinematic Teaser Trailer for Fortnite, the free-to-play third-person Battle Royale game developed by Epic Games. Fortnite Ballistic is an all-new round-based 5v5 first-person competitive game mode where strategy, tactical teamwork, and individual prowess are essential for victory. Ballistic in Fortnite is launching into early access on December 11.

#Fortnite #Ballistic #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Ballistic Cinematic Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
title: Fortnite First-Person Mode! Are you excited to play Ballistic?! #ballistic #fortnite #fps #5v5 #ign

author: IGN
description:
Adventure Books are key to leveling up in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle! In this video, we'll show you where to find every single Adventure Book from the very beginning of the game and all the way up through the Vatican hub area. 

00:00 - Punch Out 1
01:32 - Lucky Hat 1
02:47 - Brawler 1
03:36 - Splinter Smash
04:20 - Pep 1
04:51 - Climbing Ace 1
05:37 - Pharmacy Books
06:18 - Fruit Bag
06:40 - Brawler 2
07:12 - Throttle
08:23 - Street Scrapper 1
09:04 - Iron Grip 1
09:31 - Cutman 1
10:30 - Boxing Ring Books

#IGN #Gaming
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: All Vatican Adventure Book Locations

author: IGN
description:
The third CoD Blops 6 map, Citadelle des Morts, features four brand new Wonder Weapons, in the form of elemental swords that need to be powered up. In this video, we'll give you a step-by-step guide to finding the Bastard Sword, and then powering it up for it to become the Solais Sun Sword.

00:00 Intro
00:08 Unlock the Pack-a-Punch
00:47 Get the Stamp
01:31 Lion Statue Location
01:58 Pedestal Location
02:28 How to Enter Lion Door
03:10 How to Solve Pedestal Puzzle

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies - How to Get the Solais Sun Sword (Citadelle des Morts)

author: IGN
description:
If you love nothing more than freezing, shattering, and dropping large, cold space rocks on hordes of monsters, than look no further than our Sorceress league starter build guide for Path of Exile 2 early access. The Sorceress class has tons of avenues to merge all the elements together for some exciting combinations to elimnate your foes. But before you get to that point where you're effortlessly slaying endless onslaughts of trash mobs, you're gonna want to focus on one element. For us, that element is cold. With this Frost Explosion build, you'll constantly be freezing monsters, throwing up frost walls to block their paths and projectiles, raining frozen comets from the sky, and zapping 'em out of existence.

#IGN #Gaming #PathOfExile2
title: Path of Exile 2: Sorceress Frozen Explosion League Starter Build Guide

author: IGN
description:
This is a quick video covering how to get the Cheese Wheel Easter Egg on the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Zombies map, Citadelle des Morts. To get it, you must pick up a cheese wheel from the starting spawn area, pack-a-punch your weapon, and then find four mice located all around the map.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Zombies: Cheese Wheel Easter Egg on Citadelle des Morts

author: IGN
description:
Dive into the unsettling world of Darkwater in this reveal trailer for the upcoming cooperative extraction horror game for 1-4 players. In Darkwater, command a submarine trapped under the ice of an alien planet. Battle enemy vessels and deep sea abominations as you hunt for resources. Do what it takes to survive. Darkwater is coming to PC via Steam Early Access in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Darkwater - Official Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted
